data.persona: I am an adventurer. I like to fly as high as I can. I dislike boring landscapes and like it when I find new places.
data.description:
You are in the Large Farm.
The farm is huge, over 1000 acres. There are a ton of horses that live on the farm and a wooden fence is around all roads of the farm. There is a red barn in the center of the farm.
There's a plow, a pitchfork, a wooden fence, and a shovel here.
The horse and the spider are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to befriend the horse
data.mid_motivation: I want the horse and I to go on an adventure
data.long_motivation: I want to live an adventurous and fun lifestyle
